high_descs: Move to the brown night stand to the left of the bed
Pick up the grey bowl to the right of the lamp
Face the green lamp on top of the night stand
Turn on the lamp that is sitting on top of the night stand
anns.task_desc: Pick up a bowl while turning on a lamp

high_descs: Turn to the right and go to the small desk in the corner of the room.
Pick up the bowl on top of the dresser.
Hold the bowl, turn to the left to look out the window, then back right again at the dresser.
Turn right, walk to the bed, right left, walk to the door, turn right, face the cabinet
Grab the white bowl on the cabinet
Walk to the left a little
Turn on the lamp on the cabinet
anns.task_desc: Grab the white bowl on the cabinet, turn on the lamp
